kw.name: Verify App Uninstallation
kw.doc: Verifies if the application is completely uninstalled

test.doc: Tests application uninstallation - Navigates through settings - Performs uninstallation - Verifies complete removal

suite.doc: Tests for APK installation and uninstallation - Verifies APK installation via ADB - Checks application visibility in UI - Tests complete uninstallation flow
